ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts on pricing and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I made 5 spyglasses last night and 4 fishing poles after raising my skill a bit. I went to Ecomm and tried to sell off these great new things. I figured I d
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I made 5 spyglasses last night and 4 fishing poles after raising my skill
a bit. I went to Ecomm and tried to sell off these great new things. I
figured I'd charge 60pp for the spyglass and 20 for the pole at first just
to see what would happen. I did get sell two spyglasses, 1 for 53pp and 1
for 60pp. The first guy told me how much the thing sucks then sold it to
someone else for 55pp. Go figure.

I think it wil be hard to sell these things for such a bloated price. I
think 40pp may be right and *maybe* 10pp for the pole, but no one wants that
(by the way.. did anyone see if it breaks?). But we could get away with 60pp
or more at the bazaar in Ecomm on Bertoxx anyway.

Interesting story ..... =)

I myself think that the spyglasses are definatley worth 60pp just for the
roleplaying aspects ; ) I was trying to sell some cams and I had my first
spyglass on me and this big barbarian female started talking to me. So I
used the telescope to see her better (she was pretty tall)
and next thing I know she took off her shirt for me! Then I gave her 20
gnomish spirits and badabing bada boom she propositioned me for sex! LOL
Perhaps I should use this as an advertisement for selling my spyglasses...
sex sells after all =)

Perhaps it was my new sexy red robe that got her goin'? hmm...

Catbik Tinkerton
Good luck with tinkering all
